mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (id, title, artist, genre, mood, era, region, visible, rdate) VALUES(CATE_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{artist}, #{genre}, #{mood}, #{era}, #{region}, #{visible}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, artist, genre, mood, era, region, rdate, seqno, visible FROM category ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT id, title, artist, genre, mood, era, region, rdate, seqno, visible FROM category WHERE title='--' AND visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT id, title, artist, genre, mood, era, region, rdate, seqno, visible FROM category WHERE genre=#{genre} AND title!='--' AND visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
